name: password.reset
subject: %domain.name% Password Reset Requested
body:
Hi %user.firstName% %user.lastName%,

You have requested that your password at %domain.name% be reset. Please click on %password.reset.url% and follow the instructions on screen to proceed.

placeholders.name: %password.reset.url%
placeholders.description: A link which the player clicks on to reset his/her account password
